1021.Title: Welcome To The [{*str[1]*}] Guild!
1021.Content: Welcome to the [{*str[1]*}] guild! Proud to have you with us as we grow together!

1022.Title: Congratulations On Becoming The Vice Master
1022.Content: {*str[1]*} appoints you as the Vice Master, assist in developing the Guild together!

1023.Title: Guild Position Change Notification
1023.Content: {*str[1]*} has removed you from the Vice Master. Thank you for your contributions~

1024.Title: Congratulations On Becoming An Administrator
1024.Content: {*str[1]*} appoints you as an Administrator, assist in developing the Guild together!

1025.Title: Guild Position Change Notification
1025.Content: {*str[1]*} has removed you from the Administrator role. Thank you for your contributions~

1026.Title: World Event Reward
1026.Content: You have unclaimed world event rewards, please check!

1027.Title: Season Rewards
1027.Content: You activated last season's advanced pass. Please claim your rewards in time!

1028.Title: Guild Hunt Event
1028.Content: Thanks for joining the guild hunt! You've got rewards waiting-please claim them!

1030.Title: Item Temporary Storage
1030.Content: Your Inventory is full and cannot hold more items. Please clear your Inventory and retrieve items from your mail to avoid loss.

1040.Title: Points Store Items
1040.Content: Your Season Store purchase is available

1050.Title: Survey Rewards
1050.Content: Thank you for your feedback. Your survey has been received. Here is a small gift as our thanks~

1060.Title: Nickname adjustment required
1060.Content: Your previous nickname contained disallowed content and has been reset

1070.Title: Weekly Guild Activity Rewards
1070.Content: Weekly Guild Activity reward, please check!

1080.Title: Trading Center
1080.Content: You have items in the Trading Center, please check!

1090.Title: Shared Warehouse Item Return
1090.Content: You have left the shared warehouse, personal items are returned via mail. Please claim them soon.

1091.Title: Left Shared Warehouse
1091.Content: You have left the shared warehouse. No personal items remain stored. Looking forward to next time!

1100.Title: Trading Center Pre-order Result
1100.Content: Congratulations! Your pre-order was successful. Please check the attachment!

1101.Title: Trading Center Pre-order Result
1101.Content: Your pre-order failed. The refunded amount is in the attachment. Please check!

1102.Title: Consignment Successful
1102.Content: Your Rose Orb consignment was successful. Please check the attachment!

1201.Title: Guild Exit Notice
1201.Content: You have voluntarily left the Guild. You can join another Guild later.

1202.Title: Guild Exit Notice
1202.Content: You have been removed from the Guild. You can join another Guild later.

1211.Title: World Boss Crusade Reward
1211.Content: You have unclaimed personal point rewards from the World Boss Crudade. Please check!

1212.Title: World Boss Crusade Reward
1212.Content: You have unclaimed world progress rewards in the World Boss Crudade. Please check!

1213.Title: World Boss Crusade End Notice
1213.Content: Today is the last day of the World Boss Crusade. Don't forget to claim your personal points and world progress rewards. You can still participate tonight if you haven't reached the goals!

1301.Title: {*str[1]*} Reward
1301.Content: You cleared {*str[1]*} as a team member and rolled the highest number. You've received a Lucky Participation Reward. Please check it!

1302.Title: {*str[1]*} Reward
1302.Content: You cleared {*str[1]*} as a team member and rolled a low number. You've received a Regular Participation Reward. Please check it!

1303.Title: Treasure Rewards
1303.Content: You cleared the level in {*str[1]*} and killed the treasure monster, here is your reward!

1401.Title: Stimen Vaults Reward Reissue
1401.Content: This is an unclaimed reward from Stimen Vaults Floor {*str[1]*}. Please check it.

1402.Title: Stimen Vaults Progress Reward Reissue
1402.Content: You joined the ruins exploration but missed the key reward! We've sent it again-make sure to claim it next time~

1403.Title: Extreme Weekly Reward Unclaimed Reissue
1403.Content: You have unclaimed target rewards in this week's Chaotic Realm. Please check!

1405.Title: Compensated Rewards for Master Competition
1405.Content: You scored {*str[1]*} points in Master last season-here's the reward you missed! Claim it now!

1501.Title: Unclaimed Membership Box Reissue
1501.Content: The unclaimed Meowlux monthly membership Box has been temporarily stored in your mailbox, thank you for your support!

1588.Title: Homestead Warehouse Item Reimbursement
1588.NpcName:
He crouched down and started digging with his hands.
Soon, he unearthed a box with a letter inside.
1588.Content: Hey, have you forgotten something? Here are all the items you stored at the Shared Warehouse. We look forward to welcoming you to your new home soon!

1589.Title: Island ownership deeds and furniture reimbursemt
1589.NpcName:
He crouched down and started digging with his hands.
Soon, he unearthed a box with a letter inside.
1589.Content: Moving is hard work. Here are your Island ownership deeds. You can use it to return to your old home when you don't own a home. Also, all your furniture has been packed and stored in your Inventory. You can take the furniture out when you move into a new home. We wish you joy in your new home!

1590.Title: Temporary Furniture Mail:
1590.NpcName:
He crouched down and started digging with his hands.
Soon, he unearthed a box with a letter inside.
1590.Content: Oh no! Your furniture storage is full. New furniture will be temporarily stored here. Please clear some space!

2001.Title: Guild Dance Reward
2001.Content: Oops, you danced but didn't get your reward! We're sending it now-don't forget next time!

2100.Title: Reward: Homestead Level 2 Upgrade
2100.NpcName:

2200.Title: Reward: Fishing World Ranking
2200.Content: You achieved a great result in the last global fishing rankings-{*val*} place! Here's a gift for you

2201.Title: Reward: Fishing World Ranking by Fishing Guild
2201.Content: You achieved a great result in the last global fishing rankings! Here's a gift for you

2251.Title: Seabreeze Gifts
2251.NpcName:
He crouched down and started digging with his hands.
Soon, he unearthed a box with a letter inside.
2251.Content:
Dear Adventurer,

We detected you haven't claimed your Seabreeze Gifts sign-in reward. It has now been re-sent to your mailbox.

This gift from the sea includes exclusive rewards for your continued dedication. Perhaps it's shining Stardust, practical supplies, or limited-edition decorations, each a warm companion on your journey.

May the sea breeze guide you toward new and wondrous adventures!

2252.Title: Voyage's Memento​
2252.NpcName:
He crouched down and started digging with his hands.
Soon, he unearthed a box with a letter inside.
2252.Content:
Dear Adventurer,

We detected you haven't claimed your Voyage's Memento​ sign-in reward. It has not been re-sent to your mailbox.

As summer fades and autumn arrives, time moves on. Yet, the traces of a life well-lived are never forgotten.

May this joy accompany you on your journey toward even greater adventures!

2300.Title: [Reward] Redeem Code
2300.Content:
Dear Adventurer,

Please claim the rewards you have obtained via the redemption code~

3002.Title: Your Monthly Crunchyroll Rewards
3002.Content:
Dear Adventurer,

Your loyalty and courage shine brighter than a thousand stars! The Pioneer Bureau has prepared treasures worthy of your legendary deeds for this month! Grab them swiftly, for your next adventure will not wait!

3003.Title: Twitch Viewing Event Reward
3003.Content:
Dear Adventurer,

Thank you for joining the Blue Protocol: Star Resonance Twitch Drops event! You've earned the following rewards.

Enjoy your adventure!
